column4: What's a good way to set up Ubuntu to look the most like Windows 98? ( with System, Preferences, Theme )
Well, I don't... but I just wanted to get more accustomed. ;)
imo the kubuntu somewhat resembles the windows layout.
i don't think your laptop meets the minimum requirements to run Ubuntu.  let me double check.
oh.  i'm sorry.  i thought you were wanting to install Ubuntu on 16MB of RAM.
